country.description: The country from which the email was opened.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the email_open event occurred.

city.description: The city from which the email was opened.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign to which the email_open event belongs.

itblInternal.description: Internal data related to the email open event.

documentCreatedAt.description: The timestamp when the ITBL internal document was created.

documentUpdatedAt.description: The timestamp when the ITBL internal document was last updated.

ip.description: The IP address from which the email was opened.

userAgentDevice.description: The device information from which the email was opened.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the email message.

userAgent.description: The user agent string of the browser used to open the email.

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the email template used.

region.description: The region from which the email was opened.

email.description: The email address of the user who opened the email.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who opened the email.
